comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content:
Picture is between 1886 and 1896. Notice board reads;
Steamers for Sydney
7:15 Fairlight; 8:10 Brighton; 8:45 Narrabeen; 10:0 Fairlight; 12:0 Narrabeen; 12:30 Brighton; 2:30 Do (ditto Brighton); with more ferries at 3:0, 4:20; 5:15 and more at night out of view.
PS Fairlight was built 1878, Brighton 1883, Narrabeen 1886, and the next ferry was Manly which started in 1896 and isn't mentioned on the board.
